General.Name: PT Winner Nusantara Jaya Tbk
General.Description: PT Winner Nusantara Jaya Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development activities in Indonesia. It is involved in the buying, selling, leasing, and operating of owned or leased real estate properties, including apartment buildings, residential buildings, and non-residential buildings, such as storage/warehouse facilities, malls, shopping centers, and others; and provision of houses, flats, or apartments. The company also provides services related to real estate properties, including the activities of real estate agents and brokers; intermediary services for the buying, selling, and leasing of real estate properties; and real estate management, appraisal, and agency services. In addition, it offers other management consulting services; engineering and technical consultancy services; and business support services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Batam, Indonesia. PT Winner Nusantara Jaya Tbk operates as a subsidary of PT Pemenang Nusantara Internasional.
General.Address: Seraya Mas Center Blok H No 1, Batam, Indonesia, 29454
